fields.description: We support the {{Ti.UI-property-LIST_ITEM_TEMPLATE_SUBTITLE}} list-item template. Android supports the same ({{Android.Resource.Layout.SimpleListItem2}}, but it's not exposed so far. We should add it for parity.
